# Carlos Garita Campos - Full Stack Developer Portfolio

> Full-stack engineer with 3+ years of experience, specializing in architecting and delivering comprehensive software solutions. Expert in developing responsive user interfaces with React and Angular, designing robust back-end services with .NET and Python, managing SQL databases, and deploying applications in Microsoft Azure cloud environments.

## Quick Summary

- **Name**: Carlos Garita Campos
- **Role**: Full Stack Developer
- **Experience**: 2+ years in software development
- **Location**: Available for remote work worldwide
- **Specialization**: Enterprise web applications, Microfrontends, Cloud solutions
- **Languages**: Spanish (Native), English (Professional)

## Contact Information

- **Website**: https://cgarita.web.app
- **Email**: cgaritac@gmail.com

## Technical Skills

### Frontend Development
- **Frameworks/Libraries**: React JS, Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript ES6+
- **Styling**: HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, Responsive Design
- **Architecture**: Feature-Sliced Design (FSD), Single-SPA (Microfrontends)
- **Tools**: Storybook, Vite, Webpack

### Backend Development
- **Languages**: C#, Python, Java, Node.js
- **Frameworks**: .NET Core, .NET Framework, ASP.NET
- **Containerization**: Docker

### Databases
- **Relational**: SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL
- **Query Languages**: T-SQL, MySQL

### Cloud & DevOps
- **Cloud Platforms**: Microsoft Azure, Firebase
- **Authentication**: Microsoft Entra ID (Azure AD), Clerk
- **CI/CD**: Azure DevOps Pipelines, GitHub Actions
- **Version Control**: Git, GitHub, Azure Repos

## Professional Experience

### Factor K Software - Full Stack Developer & Developer Lead (July 2024 – Present)
**Key Responsibilities:**
- Lead development team and analyze Pull Requests ensuring code quality and best practices
- Architect and implement microfrontend solutions using single-spa framework
- Develop enterprise web applications using React with Feature-Sliced Design architecture
- Build robust backend services with C#, .NET Core, and Docker
- Configure and maintain CI/CD pipelines in Microsoft Azure
- Design and optimize MySQL databases for high-performance applications
- Integrate enterprise authentication with Microsoft Entra ID and Clerk

**Technologies Used:** React, Angular, TypeScript, C#, .NET, Docker, MySQL, Azure, single-spa, FSD

### Critical Mass Latam - AEM Developer (July 2023 – October 2023)
**Key Responsibilities:**
- Developed and customized Adobe Experience Manager components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
- Collaborated with Creative, Business, Technology, and QA teams
- Conducted content validation, functional testing, and accessibility compliance checks

**Technologies Used:** Adobe Experience Manager (AEM), HTML, CSS, JavaScript

### Sibu Digital - Content Author (April 2023 – June 2023)
**Key Responsibilities:**
- Performed AEM authoring activities and content management
- Managed digital assets within AEM DAM ensuring brand consistency
- Collaborated with designers on responsive design implementation

**Technologies Used:** Adobe Experience Manager (AEM), Digital Asset Management

## Featured Projects

### 1. UI Component Library
A production-ready collection of reusable UI components for enterprise web applications.
- **Description**: Modular component library with comprehensive documentation and visual testing
- **Technologies**: React, Storybook, CSS, TypeScript
- **Repository**: https://github.com/cgaritac/ui_library
- **Key Features**: Reusable components, Visual testing, Documentation

### 2. Expropriation Management System
Enterprise web application for government expropriation process management.
- **Description**: Full-stack solution for managing complex legal and administrative workflows
- **Technologies**: C#, .NET Core, Blazor, SQL Server
- **Repository**: https://github.com/cgaritac/expropriation_management_system
- **Key Features**: CRUD operations, Document management, User roles

### 3. Performance Evaluation System (Full Stack)
Complete enterprise solution for company performance evaluation management.
- **Frontend Repository**: https://github.com/cgaritac/performance_evaluation_system_FE
- **Backend Repository**: https://github.com/cgaritac/performance_evaluation_system_BE
- **Technologies**: React, Tailwind CSS (Frontend) | C#, .NET, MySQL (Backend)
- **Key Features**: Employee evaluations, Reporting, Data analytics

### 4. Helicopter Game
Interactive browser game demonstrating Python programming skills.
- **Description**: Obstacle avoidance game with physics-based mechanics
- **Technologies**: Python, Pygame
- **Repository**: https://github.com/cgaritac/helicopter_game

### 5. Airplane Passengers System
Desktop application simulating airline passenger registration.
- **Description**: Object-oriented programming demonstration
- **Technologies**: Java, Swing
- **Repository**: https://github.com/cgaritac/airplane_passengers

## Services Offered

1. **Frontend Development**: Modern, responsive web applications using React, Angular, and TypeScript
2. **Backend Development**: Scalable APIs and services with .NET, Python, and Node.js
3. **Full Stack Solutions**: End-to-end application development from design to deployment
4. **Database Design**: SQL database architecture, optimization, and administration
5. **Cloud Deployment**: Azure and Firebase deployment, CI/CD pipeline configuration
6. **Code Review & Consulting**: Architecture review, best practices implementation

- ✅ 2+ years of professional experience in enterprise software development

- ✅ Experience leading development teams and mentoring junior developers

- ✅ Passionate about clean code, testing, and continuous learning
